txt.en: Defeated Dievlig Overseer at Lhan Bach
Heartened by the potential allegiance of the elders from Lhan Bach, Lhucu proposes a plan to liberate the village.

'My father has sent many of his brutal men to Lhan Bach to quell any murmurs of rebellion. These men are the worst of our people, and their support of my father's actions must not go unpunished. \n\n'Will you help to put an end to the tyranny of my father's men in Lhan Bach? If so, return to the village and dispatch the overseers and their warriors.'
Dievlig overseers and warriors can be found in Lhan Bach, south of Lhucu's hut.\n\nLhucu has asked you to return to Lhan Bach and rid the village of her father's men.
'With the overseers deposed from the village below, we have sent a clear message to my father's forces: their tyranny shall not be tolerated!'
Lhucu is at her hut, north of Lhan Bach. \n\nYou should return to Lhucu and let her know that the town is free of the tyranny of her father and his men.
'Have you dealt with my father's minions?'
Defeat Dievlig Overseer at Lhan Bach
Talk to Lhucu at her hut
